subject: RE: [junit] problem setting up ant target for junit
msgSnippet: I don t see the location of the class(es) being tested (TestExample for instance) in the classpath ... regards, Nilesh
messageBody:
I don't see the location of the class(es) being tested (TestExample for instance)
in the classpath

> <path id="classpath.base">
> </path>
> <path id="classpath.test">
> <pathelement location="e:/junit3.8.1/junit.jar" />
> <pathelement location="${tst-dir}" />
> <path refid="classpath.base" />
> </path>

which is what it's complaining about:

> [junit] TestExample
> [junit] java.lang.ClassNotFoundException:
> TestExample

regards,
Nilesh
